title: Support Mac OS X in server Sea
body:
I would like to give a feedback
I am using Macbook and living in Singapore
I have played LOL in my pc which run by Window
I really enjoying it!
for some reasons
I have changed to Mac
And I still like to continue playing
However
server sea doesn't support on Mac
Now I really upset and have to play server Oceania instead which is 359 ms
It's lag due to high ping so I can't play it properly like before (difficult to handle)
so I would be very appreciated if in the future soon League Of Legend server sea can play in Window as well as Mac OS X
Looking forward to seeing reply.
Thanks :))

replies.body:
Hey, friend. I'm sorry to hear you're having issues playing with your Mac in the SEA servers. Unfortunately, Riot doesn't operate League in the SEA region, so you'll want to contact Garena's [**Support Team**](http://intl.garena.com/support/), as they operate and support League in these regions.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
